name: Escape Magic 2 full. ver. 3.0.0
description:
Welcome, one and all, to Magic CEO.! We hope you enjoy your stay here this week. You are the night guard here, It's pretty simple! We wish you the best of luck and most of all get this we have a new boss! The last boss we had for our compony well we don't like to talk about Ennard. But you must help us defeat him...
~~~UPDATES~~~

V3.0.0

-thats right people I just made another update. I made the game a little easier to beat. Artificial Intelligent wise.

**fixed Pat the artiest bug**

I also added a LOT of stuff to the game. I also added some fnaj ** FNAJ IS NOT MY GAME** I added some fnaj easter eggs so Joe, could find his animatronic as a model. I also added a mystery animatronic.. what is it.. who knows? but I also added some other things to solve the mystery behind the "Ennard character. Thank you, this update took forever to make so please cherish it. Thank you!
